definition: light rail/transit system (underground, at street level or elevated)/streetcar/metro/abbr. for 輕型軌道交通|轻型轨道交通[qing1 xing2 gui3 dao4 jiao1 tong1]

sentences.english: This paper discusses the advantages of LRT and the developing strategy of its development in our country.
sentences.chinese: 论述了我国发展轻轨交通的有利条件及其发展战略。

sentences.english: Stops along the route are candidates for new high-density housing, she says.
sentences.chinese: 轻轨沿线的停靠站将会是新建的高密度住宅区。

sentences.english: The Wudaokou station is on the lightrail, so you’ll have to transfer.
sentences.chinese: 五道口地铁是轻轨站，所以你要转车。

sentences.english: The light-rail system of Berlin has at that time been one of the largest in the world.
sentences.chinese: 在轻轨柏林制度在一直是世界上最大的一个时间。

sentences.english: Subway and rail passengers are subject to random bag searches.
sentences.chinese: 地铁和轻轨乘客的夸包可能会随时受到抽查。

sentences.english: There is a light railway in the city, which is one of the main public transportation.
sentences.chinese: 市内有一条轻轨铁路，这是市内主要的公共交通之一。

sentences.english: Chat with gamla guan the peng, the light rail line project to be finished in advance.
sentences.chinese: 蓬勒跟格拉莞聊起这次轻轨线路工程能提前完工。

sentences.english: We just hopped on the light rail and headed in to Tianjin.
sentences.chinese: 我们跳上轻轨，驶向天津的方向。

sentences.english: Besides, light railways were introduced, of which 125 miles were laid within a few months.
sentences.chinese: 另外，在数月间轻轨铁路也建造了125英哩。

sentences.english: Excellent commutating grade treated to give wide operating range for electrical locomotive and light rail traction motors.
sentences.chinese: 换向性能好，广泛应用于电力机车和轻轨牵引电机。

sentences.english: Be sure you buy a combination ticket for the regular subway and the lightrail.
sentences.chinese: 你一定要买张联票包括普通地铁和轻轨票。

sentences.english: Our new home is pretty close to an MRT station.
sentences.chinese: 我们的新家离轻轨站很近。

sentences.english: There is also a direct S-Bahn train to the city from the airport.
sentences.chinese: 客人还可搭乘直达轻轨列车从机场前往城市。

sentences.english: You can go there throught tunnels under the river.
sentences.chinese: 请问轻轨站在哪儿？你可以走过江隧道。

sentences.english: It is learned that the Wuhan Metro Line No. 1 was regarded as the longest light rail transit system in China.
sentences.chinese: 据了解，武汉轨道交通1号线被誉为国内最长轻轨。

sentences.english: The project to be developed shall contemplate LRT operation on 1-meter (1000 mm) gauge lines.
sentences.chinese: 轻轨车在轨距为1米的铁路上运行。

definition: public transportation/mass transit/abbr. for 公共交通[gong1 gong4 jiao1 tong1]
to change train (plane, bus etc)/transfer between modes of transport
